meanings.definition: The use of characteristic Cockney speech or slang.
meanings.sent1: She found the book fascinating because it explained different cockneyisms.
meanings.sent2: The play was full of colorful cockneyisms that made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the funny cockneyisms their grandpa used.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was sprinkled with delightful cockneyisms that charmed everyone.
meanings.sent5: Learning about cockneyisms added a unique flavor to her understanding of language.

meanings.definition: A word or phrase characteristic of Cockney speech or slang.
meanings.sent1: He struggled to understand the meaning of some unfamiliar cockneyisms.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained the origin of the cockneyisms used in the story.
meanings.sent3: The tourists were amused by the quirky cockneyisms they heard on the street.
meanings.sent4: The writer cleverly incorporated cockneyisms to give the dialogue authenticity.
meanings.sent5: The dictionary defined the cockneyisms with simple and clear explanations.
